problem_text_cn: 如图,小华为了测量所住楼房的高度,他请来同学帮忙,测量了同一时刻他自己的影长和楼房的影长分别是0.5米和10米．已知小华的身高为1.6米,那么他所住楼房的高度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaohua measured the height of the building he lived in. He invited his classmates to help and measured his own shadow length and the shadow length of the building at the same time as N_0 and N_1 respectively. Knowing that Xiaohua's height is N_2, then the height of the building he lives in is ()
raw_answer: 解:设楼房高度为x米,由题意得,\frac{x}{10}=\frac{1.6}{0.5},解得x=32．故选:C．
